Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar

Interface Shape

All Superinterfaces:
Area
All Known Subinterfaces:
ConvexShape
All Known Implementing Classes:
Circle, IntBox, IntOctagon, PolygonShape, PolylineShape, RegularTileShape, Simplex, TileShape
public interface Shape extends Area
Interface describing functionality for connected 2-dimensional shapes in the plane. A Shape object is expected to be simply connected, that means, it may not contain holes.

    Methods inherited from interface eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar.Area

    bounding_box, bounding_octagon, contains, contains, corner_approx_arr, dimension, get_border, get_holes, is_bounded, is_contained_in, is_empty, mirror_horizontal, mirror_vertical, nearest_point_approx, rotate_approx, split_to_convex, translate_by, turn_90_degree

  • Method Details

    • circumference

      double circumference()
      Returns the length of the border of this shape. If the shape is unbounded, Integer.MAX_VALUE is returned.

    • area

      double area()
      Returns the content of the area of the shape. If the shape is unbounded, Double.MAX_VALUE is returned.

    • centre_of_gravity

      FloatPoint centre_of_gravity()
      Returns the gravity point of this shape

    • is_outside

      boolean is_outside(Point p_point)
      Returns true, if p_point is not contained in the inside or the boundary of the shape

    • contains_inside

      boolean contains_inside(Point p_point)
      Returns true, if p_point is contained in this shape, but not on the border.

    • contains_on_border

      boolean contains_on_border(Point p_point)
      Returns true, if p_point lies exact on the boundary of the shape

    • distance

      double distance(FloatPoint p_point)
      Returns the distance between p_point and its nearest point on the shape. 0, if p_point is contained in this shape

    • bounding_tile

      TileShape bounding_tile()
      Return a bounding TileShape of this shape.

    • bounding_shape

      RegularTileShape bounding_shape(ShapeBoundingDirections p_dirs)
      Returns the bounding RegularTileShape with the fixed directions p_dirs

    • border_distance

      double border_distance(FloatPoint p_point)
      Returns the distance between p_point and its nearest point on the border of the shape.

    • smallest_radius

      double smallest_radius()
      Returns the smallest distance from the centre of gravity to the border of the shape.

    • enlarge

      Shape enlarge(double p_offset)
      Returns the offset shape of this shape by offseting the boundary by p_distance to the outside. The result instsnce may be of a different class than this instance. (For example an enlarged IntBox is an IntOctagon).

    • intersects

      boolean intersects(Shape p_other)
      checks, if the this shape and p_other have an nonempty intersection.

    • cutout

      Polyline[] cutout(Polyline p_polyline)
      Cuts out the parts of p_polyline in the interiour of this shape and returns a list of the remaining pieces of p_polyline. Pieces completely contained in the border of this shape are not returned.

    • intersects

      boolean intersects(IntBox p_other)
      Auxiliary function to implement the same function with parameter type Shape.

    • intersects

      boolean intersects(IntOctagon p_other)
      Auxiliary function to implement the same function with parameter type Shape.

    • intersects

      boolean intersects(Simplex p_other)
      Auxiliary function to implement the same function with parameter type Shape.

    • intersects

      boolean intersects(Circle p_other)
      Auxiliary function to implement the same function with parameter type Shape.
